changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Orders ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, foodTruckId VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, orderId VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL UNIQUE, customerId VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, orderDate DATETIME NOT NULL, totalPrice DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: teja
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS OrderItems ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, itemId VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, orderId VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, qty INT NOT NULL, itemPrice DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_order_items_orders FOREIGN KEY (orderId) REFERENCES Orders(orderId) );
